lines.text: You made me cry. It won't happen again!

[John didn't get anything for Michelle's birthday]
You should have gotten her flowers, she loves flowers.
Yes. But what happens to a flower when you pick it? It loses it's life.

[a man comes in with a huge bouquet of flowers for Michelle from her boyfriend]
Now all you have is a bunch of dead bodies.

[puts a cigar in his mouth]
Bye now.

[grunts after getting burnt in the forehead by the cigar]
I could arrest you right here on the street!
I haven't made up my mind.
